LanguageData.MustPlaceOnTable: Must be placed on a table.
LanguageData.MustPlaceOnFreeSurface: Must be placed on clear surface.
LanguageData.TabRegisterOpenedTooltip: When checked, patrons can make orders during business hours.
LanguageData.CommandToggleDiningDesc: When enabled, this location can be used for dining.
LanguageData.CommandSetDecoDesc: Change the decoration on the table.
